articles.author: Liberty Dunworth
articles.title: Jeremy Strong tried to jump into the river while filming last 'Succession' scene - NME
articles.description: He was stopped by another cast member
articles.content:
This article contains spoilers for With Open Eyes, the final episode of HBO series Succession.
Jeremy Strong has revealed that he attempted to jump into the river during his final scene in Successio… [+2685 chars]
